hero.title: Revolutionizing
hero.subtitle: Brazil’s Real Estate Market
hero.description: IBVI introduces Brazil’s first artificial intelligence–powered valuation platform, leveraging advanced analytics to deliver precise, standardized results and establish a benchmark index for real estate market.
hero.tagline: AI & Data Intelligence for a US$4 Trillion Market

overview.title: Brazilian Real Estate: <primary>Current Valuation</primary>
overview.main_paragraph: The Brazilian real estate market is valued at approximately USD 4 trillion in total asset stock, based on the country's Gross Domestic Product (GDP). Annual transaction volume reaches USD 100 billion, reflecting the sector’s scale and relevance.

challenges.title: IBVI’s Expertise and <primary>Sector Challenges</primary>
challenges.main_paragraph: IBVI was created with a clear technical mission: to correct structural distortions in Brazil’s real estate appraisal sector through a robust, data-driven automation system that delivers unprecedented efficiency to the market.

standardization_gaps.title: Standardization Through AI
standardization_gaps.description: Over 70% of appraisers still rely on manual spreadsheets. IBVI replaces these outdated methods with AI-powered automated models, delivering standardized, auditable reports updated in real time.

buyer_hurdles.title: Technical and Structured Pricing
buyer_hurdles.description: While other platforms focus on the commercial journey, IBVI operates at the core of pricing, using registry data, CRIs, FIIs, and hedonic attributes to deliver robust and defensible valuations.

outdated_methods.title: Scalable and Cost-Effective Solution
outdated_methods.description: With declining AI infrastructure costs, IBVI operates at scale with greater agility than regulatory bodies, delivering advanced technology at a market-accessible cost.

transaction_delays.title: Data Traceability and Regulatory Alignment
transaction_delays.description: Asset managers and funds demand transparency and technical rigor. IBVI provides complete data trails, clear statistical methodology, and full compliance with legal requirements and ESG standards.

solution.title: IBVI Platform <primary>Powered by AI</primary>
solution.description: IBVI aims to become the leading authority in real estate valuation in Brazil. By combining cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence, regulatory expertise, and access to data, the platform delivers a system built on transparency, precision, and trust.

data_driven_valuations.title: Unprecedented Time Reduction
data_driven_valuations.description: The IBVI platform reduces transaction times by up to 60%, automating analyses with proprietary AI and delivering accurate, traceable valuations aligned with predefined standards.

predictive_analytics.title: Greater Operational Efficiency
predictive_analytics.description: The system automates critical stages such as validation and pricing, reducing reliance on manual processes and speeding up compliance with CMN Resolution No. 4,951/2021.

intelligent_search.title: Proprietary Standardized Index
intelligent_search.description: Inspired by the EPRA Index, IBVI introduces Brazil’s first luxury real estate index based on key variables such as area, location, amenities, and official transaction history.

standardized_index.title: Authority in Property Valuation
standardized_index.description: With advanced AI, robust data intelligence, and deep regulatory knowledge, IBVI positions itself as the reference in high-end property valuation, driving trust and market transparency.

solution.quote: "IBVI's proprietary valuation platform represents a paradigm shift in how Brazilian luxury real estate is evaluated and transacted."

insights.title: Market <primary>Insights</primary>
insights.description: Comprehensive analysis of Brazil's luxury real estate market reveals significant opportunities for technological innovation and standardization.

vision.title: Mission
vision.p1: IBVI’s mission is to lead the development of the next generation of the real estate market in Brazil and, eventually, across Latin America.
vision.p2: With advanced technology, artificial intelligence, and regulatory validation, IBVI introduces a new valuation infrastructure: technical, scalable, and reliable.

expansion.title: Expansion
expansion.p1: With an innovative approach and proprietary technology, IBVI aims to lead the transformation of Brazil’s high-end real estate market.
expansion.p2: The platform is preparing to expand across Latin America, offering digital solutions, reliable data, and automated valuations tailored to the new profile of today’s real estate buyer.

about.title: Discover the IBVI Platform
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing Brazilian Real Estate with AI Intelligence
about.description: The IBVI platform is at the forefront of transforming Brazil’s $4 trillion real estate market through cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and data analysis, bringing unprecedented transparency and precision to property valuations.

transparency.title: Standardization with AI
transparency.description: We replace traditional methods with automated models that deliver technical reports in minutes, with high accuracy and controlled variance.

precision.title: National Technical Benchmark
precision.description: With a proprietary database aligned with Brazilian regulations, IBVI provides valuations compliant with the Central Bank, financial institutions, and asset managers overseeing over USD$220 billions.

innovation.title: Scalable and Secure Solution
innovation.description: Our Google Cloud infrastructure enables scalability to over 1 million valuations per day, reducing costs, ensuring security, and overcoming speed limitations.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.description: IBVI’s technology combines advanced automation, regulatory intelligence, and proprietary data to deliver accurate, secure, and scalable valuations. Our platform transforms complexity into efficiency.

machine_learning.title: Advanced Machine Learning
machine_learning.description: Our algorithms process vast datasets including property characteristics, market trends, location factors and economic indicators to generate high-precision valuations.

intelligent_search.title: Technical Differentials
intelligent_search.description: IBVI stands out by offering a unique technical infrastructure in Brazil, featuring a proprietary index, structured data architecture, and full integration with the new dynamics of the digital real estate market.
intelligent_search.feature_3: Connection with the New Buyer Profile

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: IBVI is composed of experts in Engineering, Data Science, Economics, Communications, and Financial Markets. This technical integration ensures accurate, secure valuations that meet the standards required by institutions and investment funds.

cta.title: Stay Ahead with IBVI Innovations
cta.description: Join the leading Real Estate valuation platform in Brazil.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: MBRAS/IBVI ("we", "our" or "us") operates the IBVI AI application. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal data when you use our service.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of information:

location.title: Location Data
location.content: We use your location to show nearby properties

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: Information about how you use the application

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.content: Device type, operating system, error logs

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use the collected data to:

items.3: Show relevant properties based on your location
items.5: Send important notifications about the service
items.6: Analyze usage patterns and fix errors

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell, rent or share your personal data with third parties, except:

items.3: With service providers (e.g., Google Maps, Sentry) under confidentiality agreement

security.title: Storage and Security
security.content: Your data is stored on secure servers and protected by encryption. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights (LGPD)
rights.intro: According to the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), you have the right to:

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. You can request deletion of your account at any time through the account deletion page.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our application uses the following third-party services:

items.1: Google Maps: For map display and location
items.3: Expo: For app updates and functionality

minors.title: Minors
minors.content: Our service is not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion - IBVI AI
accountDeletion.warning: Warning: Account deletion is permanent and irreversible. All your data will be permanently removed.

whatDeleted.title: What Will Be Deleted
whatDeleted.intro: When you delete your account, the following information will be permanently removed:

items.4: All data associated with your account

steps.4: Scroll to the bottom and tap "Delete Account"

method2.title: Method 2: By Email

items.3: Confirmation: "I request permanent deletion of my account"

method2.step4: Wait for confirmation (up to 48 business hours)

timeline.title: Deletion Timeline
timeline.intro: Your account will be deleted within 30 days of the request. During this period:

items.2: You can cancel the request by contacting us
items.3: After 30 days, deletion will be permanent

dataRetained.title: Data That Will Remain
dataRetained.intro: For legal obligations, some data may be retained for a minimum period:

items.1: Data necessary to comply with tax and legal obligations
items.2: Access logs (anonymized format) for security purposes
items.3: Aggregated and anonymized data for statistical analysis

help.title: Need Help?
help.intro: If you have questions about the account deletion process, please contact us:
